Text: Thanks!  Can you recommend a reading order for these?  I wasn't able to catch it from the beginning.

You're both welcome.

brega10 the War of Kings torrent comes with a reading order.  As stated in description above there is no reading order for Realm of Kings.  Writer Andy Lanning stated "It's less an event and more a state of mind." about Realm of Kings.

After reading the Realm of Kings one-shot you can then read the other titles in any order.
Thank you very much! I've been able to catch-up with my reading thanks to post like yours.
